definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: The study appears in the current issue of the Journal of Gene Therapy.
sentences.chinese: 这项研究发表在基因治疗学当前的问题。

sentences.english: Current advances of gene-therapy combined with radiotherapy for malignant glioma have been reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 简述恶性脑肿瘤基因治疗，联合放射治疗的现状。

sentences.english: The new methods also include antisense nucleic acid technique and ribozyme technique in gene therapy…
sentences.chinese: 新发展的还有反义疗法以及应用核酶进行基因治疗等。

sentences.english: Antisense technology is a strategy of gene therapy.
sentences.chinese: 反义技术是基因治疗的一个策略。

sentences.english: The conclusion contributes to the clinical gene-therapy and the study on gene drugs.
sentences.chinese: 可为临床基因治疗及相关基因药物研究提供实验依据。

sentences.english: Methods Reading recent references about gene therapy for cardiovascular diseases, then recapitulating them.
sentences.chinese: 阅读并参考国内外关于应用基因治疗心血管病的文献。

sentences.english: Suicide gene therapy is based on the gene-delivery or antibody-delivery of a gene that encodes an enzyme converting a prodrug into a potent cytotosin.
sentences.chinese: 自杀基因疗法是近年乳腺癌基因治疗研究的热点之一。

sentences.english: Gene therapies make the antiangiogenesis therapy become more special.
sentences.chinese: 基因治疗则使抗血管生成治疗更具有靶向性。

sentences.english: Brain scans have revealed that the first gene-based therapy for Parkinson's disease was effective.
sentences.chinese: 脑扫描结果显示首次帕金森病的基因治疗有效。

sentences.english: Gene therapy is one of the main directions of restoring bone defect.
sentences.chinese: 基因治疗是修复骨缺损的主要研究方向之一。

sentences.english: Gene therapy is now impeded by lack of safe and effective vectors .
sentences.chinese: 目前基因治疗受阻于缺乏安全有效的载体。

pinyin: duo1 fa1 xing4 gu3 sui3 liu2

definition: mesenchymal stem cell MSC (in cell biology)
pinyin: jian1 chong1 zhi4 gan4 xi4 bao1
